title: 为什么我一安装一些MOD游戏就会崩溃？
author: 逆魂¤离朱
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to F:\Gamepaopaoche\minecraft151MODZW\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-25_12.08.32-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

就是这个，我只要把MOD删除他就复原了，但是我很想要那个MOD，所以求解决

replies.author: hzy5548
replies.txt_content:
可能性有很多
1、froge版本不兼容
2、与其他mod不兼容
3、版本不对

replies.author: a20001017
replies.txt_content:
zolandre_extraDoors{1.1 汉化 by Nkiy} [Extra Doors] (更多门1.1-1.5.1汉化.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Errored

这个更多门MOD的问题,去掉即可

replies.author: Mi`ki
replies.txt_content:
把更多门MOD删掉
以后记住装MOD一旦崩溃，看看哪里有Errored，就删那个MOD
若删了还崩溃，再找到Errored，删了那个MOD。把刚才第一次删的恢复（这只是我的经验，希望对你有用）

replies.author: Mi`ki
replies.txt_content:
把更多门MOD删了
若删了还崩溃，那就再找错误报告的Errored结尾那行，对应下来删那个MOD，把第一次删的恢复
这只是我的经验，希望对你有帮助
